definition: able to resist the explosive force of bombs and shells, a chamber (often underground) reinforced against bombing and provided with food and living facilities, to make safe against bombings
details:
adjective
- able to resist the explosive force of bombs and shells
= example: able to resist the explosive force of bombs and shells
= synonyms: shellproof
noun
- a chamber (often underground) reinforced against bombing and provided with food and living facilities
= synonyms: bomb shelter, air-raid shelter
verb
- to make safe against bombings
= example: to make safe against bombings
